page.title: 04The Golden Eagles
page.content: In our marching band we have got black and yellow uniforms. The music we play is Crystal Chandeliers, Ribbons of Blue, Only you, Sealed With a Kiss, Take the High Road, Down by the Riverside and Shores of Tripoli. We play instruments like kazoos, drums, bellyres, maracas, tambourines, bass drum and tenordrum. We practice twice a week in the Youth club. David, Kath and Dawn, who live in the village, teach us. We visit local places where we do a road march then we do a display of marching on a nearby field. We get judged on road march then we get changed and eat our lunch after that we go round the stalls and then get changed again for display. After display we get the results and see if we have won anything.Then we go home for our tea.
